channel.title: If timer reaches?

item.title: If timer reaches?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

I tried adding
if(CountDown == 0){
stuff
}
but it doesnt work, so how can i make it do the action when the timer reaches a number
note my timer is set through command and subtracts till it hits 0

Read full topic
